## 판결문 요약


Ingraham, J.:.
By a contract executed the 12th day of October, 1904, the defendant agreed to sell and the plaintiffs agreed to purchase certain real'property consisting of two lots of land on Madison street upon which was a tenement house. The price to be paid therefor was $78,000, of' which $2,000 was paid on or-before the signing of the contract; . $8,000 was to be paid in cash upon delivery of the deed; $45,000 by taking said premises subject to a mortgage then a- lien on the property; and the-balance of .$23,000 by the execution of a second mortgage, the deed to be delivered on the 15th of November, 1904.
